group_1.narration: I started realizing things...about myself,@and about Kaede and Momoko, too.
Little by little, I was starting to see what was going on around me...@But Rena's always too late. Even this time was no different.
Reflecting on it now...I should've noticed things sooner.@And done something about it.
I knew something was wrong with Kaede, and I already@had my doubts about the Wings of the Magius.
...But even though she knew, all Rena did was run away.@That's gotta be why things turned out how they did...@Rena blamed herself for it over and over.
Thanks to Iroha and the others, we were able to@hold Kaede back after she fused with her Doppel...
But Kaede never came back to us.
That's when Mitama showed up.
She said it was for "quarantine" or something...@and she just locked Kaede away...!
Yeah, Mitama said Doppels were dangerous...@But no one ever said anything like this could happen.
As I listened to Momoko demand answers from Mitama...@I just stared at what Kaede had become,
wondering what I should have done differently.@Because even now, Rena still didn't know anything.
Mitama said Kaede was lucky...@That at least, she was still alive.
But being locked away, barely not dead...@Rena couldn't stand it.
Even if we fought again, even if I ended up the bad guy again...@I didn't care. I just wanted Kaede to come back.
Because Kaede is my friend.@And...she's where I belong.
I was angry at Mitama for not telling us@anything back then.
And later...Rena started getting mad at herself, too,@for not stopping Kaede from using her Doppel.
I mean, we were the ones who didn't stop her, right...@Even if we didn't know how dangerous Doppels were,@we were still the ones who kept letting Kaede use hers.
Rena lost count of just how many times@Kaede used her Doppel to save us.
Even now, Rena still can't help but think about it.
...If we'd known the risks of using Doppels back then,
maybe none of this would've ever happened.
I didn't know anything.@Not a single thing at all.
Not about Magical Girls.@Not about Doppels, either.
Or how much that meddling Momoko was@really thinking about us the whole time.
Or how much Kaede was hurting, all on her own.@Even the friends right by my side...@I never noticed a thing.
There's still so much I don't know even now, after everything.@And honestly, I probably never will.
Despite that...@I know what really matters now.
Everyone's got their own feelings they're holding onto inside.@Loving people, being loved... That's how we live, right?
Rena's not the same Rena she used to be.
I can't change what happened before...@But I can change what comes next.
Together with the precious friends@who care about me.
